snippet: The fire was reported around 4 a.m. on Sunday at a three-story single-family home in the 800 block of South 15th Street, said the chief of detectives for the Essex County Prosecutor’s Office.
abstract: Fire breaks out inside Newark home, killing six people, including an 11-year-old boy; cause of blaze is under investigation.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and DANIEL E. SLOTNIK
byline.contributor: Emma G. Fitzsimmons contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The fire was reported around 4 a.m. on Sunday at a three-story single-family home in the 800 block of South 15th Street, said the chief of detectives for the Essex County Prosecutor’s Office.

headline.main: Six Are Killed in a House Fire in Newark
headline.print_headline: Six Are Killed in a House Fire in Newark
